General.Name: Vishnu Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Vishnu Chemicals Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of chromium and barium chemicals in India. The company offers chrome chemicals, such as sodium dichromate, chromic acid, chrome oxide green, basic chromium sulphate, sodium sulphate, and potassium dichromate, as well as barium carbonate. Its products are used in various applications, such as steel, glass, pharmaceutical, pigments and dyes, leather, and other industries. The company also supplies its products to Asia, China, South East Asia, Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, South and Central America, Africa, and internationally. Vishnu Chemicals Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
